page.title: 18HEALTH
page.content: THERE IS A HEALTH CENTRE IN BOZEAT WHERE THERE IS A DOCTOR'S SURGERY.THE DOCTORS ARE DR.DAVID AND DR.SHEILA SWAN IT WAS BUILT IN AUGUST 1975.THEY ALSO HAVE A SURGERY IN WOLLASTON.PEOPLE GO IN THERE FOR TABLETS AND MEDICINE. THE NEAREST HOSPITALS ARE AT KETTERING OR NORTHAMPTON.WE WERE TOLD THAT THE MAIN ILLNESSES IN THE 1920's,WERE RINGWORM,CHICKEN-POX,DIPTHERIA,SCARLET FEVER AND MEASLES.THERE WERE TWO SURGERIES IN BOZEAT AT THAT TIME.ONE WAS AT THE BOTTOM OF ALLEN'S HILL AND THE OTHER AT THE TOP. THERE ARE DENTISTS AND OPTICIANS AT OLNEY AND WELLINGBOROUGH.
